actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to impose fees under that Act for the review of applications for marketing approval for new human drugs, antibiotics, medical devices, and biological products, and for other purposes.
short_title: New Drug and Device Application Fee Amendments of 1987

summary.text: New Drug and Device Application Fee Amendments of 1987 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish fees to cover the costs of review for: (1) new drugs; (2) antibiotic drugs; (3) medical devices; and (4) biologic products licensing.

titles.title: New Drug and Device Application Fee Amendments of 1987

A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to impose fees under that Act for the review of applications for marketing approval for new human drugs, antibiotics, medical devices, and biological products, and for other purposes.
